# Exploratory Data Analysis



# Overview of GDP Per Capita

- GDP per capita varies across countries.
- Significant disparities in economic performance.



# Life Expectancy Insights

- Life expectancy tends to be higher in countries with higher GDP per capita.
- Countries with lower GDP per capita have a lower life expectancy.

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: A bar chart of GDP per capita by the top 20 countries
#| label: fig-bar

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import numpy as np

# Load the dataset
df = pd.read_csv("wdi.csv")
# Bar chart of GDP per capita by the top 20 countries
gdp_per_capita_data = df[['country', 'gdp_per_capita']].dropna()
gdp_per_capita_data = gdp_per_capita_data.sort_values(by='gdp_per_capita', ascending=False).head(20)

plt.figure(figsize=(6, 4))
plt.bar(gdp_per_capita_data['country'], gdp_per_capita_data['gdp_per_capita'], color='skyblue')
plt.title('Top 20 Countries by GDP per Capita (2022)')
plt.xlabel('Country')
plt.ylabel('GDP per Capita (USD)')
plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
```

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: A scatter plot of Life Expectancy vs. GDP per Capita
#| label: fig-scatter

# Scatter plot for Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita
plt.figure(figsize=(6,4))
plt.scatter(df['gdp_per_capita'], df['life_expectancy'], color='green')
plt.title('Life Expectancy vs GDP Per Capita')
plt.xlabel('GDP Per Capita (USD)')
plt.ylabel('Life Expectancy (Years)')
plt.show()

```

- Economic performance and health indicators are closely linked.
